rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious hallway aligned with the North-facing entrance, designed to welcome visitors in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area that merges seamlessly into the kitchen, providing a modern, spacious feel. Vastu alignment encourages social interaction and positivity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. Designed for efficiency and ease of movement, incorporating local Chettinad aesthetics with functional layout.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom located on the ground floor for convenience. Designed with ample storage and natural light, following local architectural norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom on the ground floor. Vastu principles ensure calm and positive energy in this private space.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated, well-ventilated gym area that can be converted into a recreational or workout space. Designed with modern equipment storage and sufficient natural light.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Standard ground floor bathroom for use by guests, following local standards in dimensions and design aesthetics.

openings.description: The main entrance door facing north, adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Large windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation as per local architectural norms.
Windows designed for cross-ventilation in the open-plan kitchen area.
Sliding glass door that maintains an uninterrupted flow between living and kitchen spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom - Suite Extension
rooms.description: Additional space in the master bedroom area to provide extra privacy, storage, or a dressing room. Aligning with local residential needs.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom Extension
rooms.description: Additional guest room extension for enhanced comfort and space as required by extended family visits.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated study area that doubles as an office, designed with natural light and ergonomic considerations in mind.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A small utility room for storage of cleaning supplies or extra appliances, following standard residential requirements.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Additional bathroom on the first floor to cater to multiple users, designed with contemporary finishes and functional layout.

openings.description: Private balcony for the master suite, enhancing natural light and providing a pleasant outdoor view.
Large window ensuring ample daylight for productivity in the study area.

notes: This design reflects Chettinad-style aesthetics with intricate detailing and traditional motifs incorporated into modern functional spaces.
The ground floor layout prioritizes open-plan living and a private gym, while the first floor provides additional bedrooms and utility areas.
Vastu principles have been considered in room placements, entrance orientation, and natural light optimization.
